name: Welcome to GhostCorp
description:
There's some spooky business going on at GhostCorp!!

Created in bitsy for the Ghosts with Jobs jam. 
Assembled with borksy (thanks ayo!)
Also thanks to mildmojo, sean and ducky for various hacks. 
The music is a remix by Franz Keller at Overclocked Remix.
The characters are not my property, obviously.
